activities: Polycom offers global communications and technology solutions to businesses worldwide.  For example, we offer telepresence, video, and voice solutions and services, which allow our customers to enable their workforce to connect and collaborate from their desktops, meeting rooms, class rooms, and mobile settings.  Our customers are businesses; however, during the course of providing our services and conducting our business we may receive certain personal data about individuals who are residents of the EEA or Switzerland, including customers, vendors, resellers, partners and clients.  Polycom also has employees in the EEA and Switzerland, and may receive personal data relating to employees (whether temporary, permanent, part-time or contract), former employees, independent contractors, or job applicants who are also residents of the EEA or Switzerland.
